metadata.description: Give Cursor a live connection to the web — scrape, search, crawl, and extract structured data from any site

plugins.name: olostep
plugins.description: Give your AI agent a live connection to the web. Scrape any URL, search the web, crawl entire doc sites, and extract structured JSON — with JS rendering, anti-bot bypass, and residential proxies built in. No more hallucinated APIs or stale docs.
